entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then 40 percent chance of flurries. A few flurries beginning this morning. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
